thread.title: Willie Nelson cancels concert in Reading due to illness
thread.title_full: Willie Nelson cancels concert in Reading due to illness

author: JENELLE JANCI | Staff Writer
title: Willie Nelson cancels concert in Reading due to illness
text:
Comments 
Willie Nelson canceled his concert at Reading's Santander Arena due to illness, according to the Santander Arena's website . 
Nelson was scheduled to perform with Merle Haggard on Saturday, Oct. 17. A free pre-show block party featuring Caroline Reese has also been canceled. 
The update offers no further details about Nelson's condition, only citing his reason for cancellation as an illness. 
Refunds will be issued at point of purchase, according to the announcement. Patrons with additional questions are asked to call 610-898-7469. Tags
